name: Merciless Butchery

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Dastardly Finish, sneak attack +5d6, studied target class feature.

sections.text: As a standard action that does not provoke attacks of opportunity, you can attempt a coup de grace against a cowering, helpless, or stunned opponent that you have designated as your studied target.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your talent for slaughter lets you dispatch helpless opponents before they can recover.
